title: digitalops
text:
Adrian Correndo, PhD
Welcome! Here you can check the latest updates on my digital tools projects.

Shinyapps
1. soiltestcorr demo app

2. corny0 app

3. metrica demo app



R-packages
1. soiltestcorr: Soil test correlation & calibration in R

2. metrica: Prediction performance metrics in R

3. Xpolaris: an R-package to retrieve United States soil data at 30-meter resolution



Harvard Dataverse Repository



Video tutorials
Agro-meteorological data using R software

Regression Tress and Random Forests

For more details see my webpage
